body:
> I tend to believe that aside from very knowledgeable gophers, nobody is using go from master for production

I think there are enough people who fits into this category with very different opinions on this proposal. An experiment may give us debate ideas with concrete cases. Currently, this proposal is hard to discuss any further because of its theoretical nature. It is hard to predict what the outcome will be like. It is hard to determine what the scale of the damage would be like.
